text: I'm feeling really happy today because I aced my exam!
I finally understood that complex calculus topic! Feeling great.
I'm so stressed about the upcoming finals, I can't sleep.
What if I fail my internship interview tomorrow?
It feels like everything is falling apart and I just want to give up.
I missed my family a lot today and felt really lonely.
I'm so angry at my professor for that unfair grade.
My group project partner isn't doing any work and it's making me furious.
I was thinking about ending it all last night.
What medication should I take for my anxiety?
Everything is just boring today. Not much happening.
